Title: EnBW doubles long-term LNG import capacity booking at Germany’s Stade terminal
Description: EnBW has secured long-term capacity for an additional 3 bn m3 a year at the Hanseatic Energy Hub’s proposed Stade LNG receiving terminal in Germany’s northwest state of Lower Saxony, after already securing the rights to import 3 bn m3 a year of LNG at the terminal in December last year.
Author: CK

Title: Freeport LNG’s April shipments poised to double from March, output near nameplate capacity
Description: The 15 mtpa Freeport LNG plant in Texas is poised to double its exports this month from a year earlier as it continues to ramp up exports after restarting production in February.
Author: CK

Title: Delfin agrees 20-year LNG supply deal for 0.6 mtpa with Hartree
Description: US project developer Delfin has agreed to supply commodities trader Hartree Partners with 0.6 mtpa of LNG over 20 years from its proposed Delfin Deepwater Port LNG export facility offshore Louisiana.
Author: CK
